text: 'I will leave you the necessary prescription for the sedatives. You will contact your new doctor when you reach your parents' house.' She watched him flick his fountain-pen with a gesture she knew so well, he tore off the leaflet and handed it to her.
handwritten_text: 'I will leave you the necessary prescription for the sedatives. You will contact your new doctor when you reach your parents' house.' She watched him flick his fountain-pen with a gesture she knew so well, he tore off the leaflet and handed it to her.
